mapper.select: select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id bookId, order_price orderPrice, order_date orderDate from orders
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id bookId, order_price orderPrice, order_date orderDate from orders where order_id = ${orderId}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id bookId, order_price orderPrice, order_date orderDate from orders where cust_id in ${custId}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id bookId, order_price orderPrice, order_date orderDate from orders where book_id in ${bookId}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id bookId, order_price orderPrice, order_date orderDate from orders where order_price >= ${orderPrice}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id bookId, order_price orderPrice, order_date orderDate from orders where order_date >= '2007'||'${value}'
mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_id, cust_id, book_id, order_price, order_date) values (${orderId}, ${custId}, ${bookId}, ${orderPrice}, #{orderDate})
